short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove div elements containing specific keywords from web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrom Extension, more of a productivity tool that allows you to blacklist certain keywords that you see are taking your time the most. For example, you ban "big brother" and any Facebook post with this keyword will automatically be removed from your feed. 

Besides that, this also removes content from most of the prominent media in Kosova. The logic is the same, staying productive by removing certain content.

The good thing is that you can go back to normality whenever you want by just deleting that keyword.
